tasks.label: build-windows
tasks.command: New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path build; Set-Location build; cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DCMAKE_C_FLAGS_DEBUG=-g\ -O0 .. -G \"MinGW Makefiles\"; make

tasks.label: build-linux
tasks.command: mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DCMAKE_C_FLAGS_DEBUG=-g\ -O0 .. && make
